tutorial.step1.title: Track Your Habits
tutorial.step1.desc: Create and track daily habits. Check them off each day to build consistency and momentum.
tutorial.step2.title: Build Streaks
tutorial.step2.desc: Keep your streak alive by completing habits every day. The longer your streak, the more motivated you will be!
tutorial.step3.title: Earn Badges
tutorial.step3.desc: Unlock achievements and badges as you progress. Celebrate your wins, big and small!
tutorial.step4.title: Set Goals
tutorial.step4.desc: Define your goals and break them into milestones. Track your progress and achieve your dreams!
tutorial.step5.title: Earn ATOMIC Points
tutorial.step5.desc: Every habit you complete earns you ATOMIC points. Watch your score grow as you become the best version of yourself!
